STM32CubeL4 Firmware Package V1.6.0RC2 / 29-July-2016

Main Changes
  • Second Beta Release version (API freeze) to support STM32L451xx/STM32L452xx/STM32L462xx devices 
    • HAL and Low Layer drivers updated after silicon validation.
    • STemWin middleware library V5.32
    • Around 100 EWARM project Examples, Applications (FreeRTOS and USB Device) and Demonstration with Adafruit shield for STM32L452RG-Nucleo board.
